alert.note: Alert for Broome; Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Otsego, southeastern Broome, Delaware, northeastern Susquehanna and northern Wayne Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 713 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Middlefield to near Gibson. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oneonta, Jackson, Walton, Delhi, Davenport, Worcester, Middlefield, Colchester, Maryland and Westville. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 83 and 93. Interstate 88 between 13 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
